agenda.description: ** REVISION ** HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Environmental Regulation TIME & DATE: 10:30 AM or upon final adjourn./recess or bill referral if permission granted. Wednesday, March 20, 2019 PLACE: E1.026 CHAIR: Rep. J. M. Lozano The order in which bills are heard is at the discretion of the chair. The committee will meet to hear public testimony on the following: HB 1708 Lozano | et al. Relating to the expedited processing of certain applications for permits under the Texas Clean Air Act. HB 1953 Thompson, Ed Relating to relating to reducing the volume of wastes disposed of in landfills by promoting the beneficial conversion of plastics and other recoverable materials using pyrolysis and gasification processes. HB 2203 Miller | et al. Relating to notice of a radioactive substance release. HB 2661 Blanco Relating to requiring school districts to adopt a policy regarding the idling of the engine of a school bus. HB 3114 Kacal Relating to contested case hearings on matters under the jurisdiction of the Texas Commission on Environmental Quality. ** See Committee Coordinator for previous versions ** of the schedule, if applicable. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
